{"step_by_step_thinking": "The rate of drug absorption can be determined by looking at the plasma concentration graph. The key parameters to consider are Tmax and Cmax. Tmax represents the time at which the maximum concentration of the drug is reached in the plasma, while Cmax represents the maximum concentration itself. These two parameters together provide information about the rate at which the drug is absorbed. Therefore, the correct answer is A. Tmax and Cmax.", "answer_choice": "A"}
